Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for satellite communication, bandwidth, latency, and redundancy. Identify the applications and services that will use Azure Orbital.
Design the network architecture, including the placement of ground stations, integration with Azure Virtual Networks, and connectivity to satellite systems.
Request and obtain any required authorizations or licenses for satellite communication, including spectrum allocation and regulatory compliance.
Set up Azure Orbital resources in the Azure portal, including ground station access and satellite communication endpoints.
Configure Azure Virtual Networks, ExpressRoute, or VPN connections to ensure secure and reliable communication between Azure Orbital and other Azure services.
Apply security best practices, including encryption for data in transit, access control policies, and integration with Azure Security Center.
Perform thorough testing of satellite communication, including latency measurements, throughput tests, and failover scenarios.
Set up monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and Network Watcher to track satellite communication performance and detect issues.
Create detailed documentation of the network architecture, configurations, and operational procedures for Azure Orbital.
Provide training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting Azure Orbital networking components.
Verify that the setup meets all regulatory compliance requirements and implement regular auditing procedures.
